page.title: 02Old Resident Views Aughton
page.content: In Aughton there have been many changes over the years. Population has increased and people have come to our area from outside. This means that people do not always know their neighbours. There are more young people and many are not as thoughtful as they were. Employment has changed a lot with greater variety of jobs, but because of increased population, still high unemployment. Wages are higher but so is inflation so it is hard to manage. Our shopping area is much better but it is hard to reach the shops because of traffic. It is much busier. Health centres and dentists are limited. There are not enough playgrounds and youth clubs and that means young people are on the streets causing trouble. There should be quiet parks for old people to sit in.
